short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds buttons to bitbucket comments to copy links to the comments and to copy the filename:lineNumber for easy navigation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds two buttons to Bitbucket comments. One button that copies a link to the comment, and one button that copies the filename and line number to the clipboard so it can easily be pasted into IDE's and take you to the exact spot in your code the comment was left. Both of these can be toggled on and off.
